contentfulPagePressRelease.title: Global Cardiology Science & Practice publishes Issue 5 on QScience.com

childMarkdownRemark.html:
Global Cardiology Science & Practice has published issue 5 on QScience.com, the digital publishing portal for research journals.

Global Cardiology Science & Practice is a peer-reviewed cardiology journal and is fully ‘open access’, meaning articles are free-to-read on the web and authors retain copyright on their works.

Topics included in the issue range from Acute coronary syndrome in the Middle East, Cell therapy trials using cardiac‐derived cells, Bioengineering and the cardiovascular system, Temperature management in cardiac surgery, Science and practice of arrhythmogenic cardiomyopathy: A paradigm shift, Primary coronary angioplasty for ST‐Elevation Myocardial Infarction in Qatar: First nationwide program and many more.

QScience.com already hosts fifteen scholarly journals covering diverse subject areas such as information & library studies, sustainable energy, education, medicine and bioscience, Middle Eastern healthcare, design and Islamic studies.Many additional journals are scheduled for 2013
